segments.text: I notice the open cabinets and the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and that makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His fingers are deep in the jar, pulling out goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him looks eager, palm up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the sink, water is spilling everywhere unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in the puddle, but she's clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly, waiting their turn to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden path lined with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real accident so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds just long enough for him to grab one more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels tense, like holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nobody seems to sense the danger building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's nerve-wracking to watch from afar.
segments.speaker: PAR
